Detailed Description

A widget that enables the user to select a number form a predefined range.

Common control of the NumberPicker.

 class MyListener : public gaia::ui::IOnScrollIdleStateListener
 {
   public:
     MyListener();
     virtual ~MyListener();
     virtual void onDataSet(NumberPicker* target, int32_t data);
 };

 MyListener::MyListener()
 {
 }

 MyListener::~MyListener()
 {
 }

 void MyListener::onDataSet(NumberPicker* target, int32_t data)
 {
    //Callback to provide CenterView Id when scroll state turn to idle.
 }

 NumberPicker* np = new NumberPicker(this);
 MyListener* ml = new MyListener();
 np->setIOnScrollIdleStateListener(ml);
 np->setRange(1, 10);
 np->setCenterView(1);
